attributes.action: Make Helen Mirren the successor to the throne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
She is already a Dame, but this does not fulfill the recognition she deserves. Lets face it, do we really need a man who talks to plants to represent the United Kingdom?

Dame Helen Mirren has the expierence of acting as Elizabeth I and Elizabeth II, and looking glamorous (at award ceremonies), for this she deserves to be pitted as a contender for successor, as much so as any other. 

Furthermore, the successor should be chosen in an X-factor style tv-show headed by Simon Cowell to decide our next monarch, Judi Dench and Stephen Fry should also be in the running.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
